mapper.sql: accountId, status, accountType, insertTime, ver, productId
mapper.select: select * from (select * from t_factory_account_id where productid = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `status` = 'NUS' limit 300) a order by RAND() limit 5;
mapper.insert: insert into t_factory_account_id (accountId, status, accountType, insertTime, ver, productId ) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{accountType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into t_factory_account_id
accountId,

accountType,
insertTime,
ver,
productId,

mapper.update:
update t_factory_account_id
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
accountType = #{accountType,jdbcType=CHAR},
insertTime = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ver = #{ver,jdbcType=INTEGER},
productId = #{productId,jdbcType=CHAR},
where accountId = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_factory_account_id set status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, accountType = #{accountType,jdbcType=CHAR}, insertTime = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ver = #{ver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productId = #{productId,jdbcType=CHAR} where accountId = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
